ygData.subject: Re: Question about multiple characters
ygData.msgSnippet: luckily for me, most of my guild, i work with IRL. so when i make new characters, i either have an officer invite me when they are in my new character s area,
ygData.messageBody:
luckily for me, most of my guild, i work with IRL. so when i make new
characters, i either have an officer invite me when they are in my new
character's area, or the guildmaster. =)

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 20th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

At 02:33 PM 6/2/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
>That's interesting. I'm gonna talk it out with my guild tonight. How do you
>make that work? My enchanter is a one if the 4 guild generals ( officer ).
>Did you guys decide that the new characters have the same rank in the guild?
>Skara de Toxxulia < Elite >
>
>
-------------------
